DOC.brief_summary: Physical activity adolescent important part bone health . Good bone health adolescent decrease risk osteoporosis . This study evaluate program design increase level physical activity adolescent girl .
DOC.detailed_description: Despite document health benefit increase physical activity , limit research behavioral program design increase exercise adolescent . Psychosocial characteristic , self-efficacy exercise , social support exercise family peer , perceive benefit barrier exercise , may predispose adolescent toward adoption maintenance physical activity . This study implement multifaceted behavioral program specifically design increase bone strengthen physical activity address many psychosocial factor relate exercise . Girls study enrol Project Fitness Bone ( FAB ) . The Project FAB intervention deliver regular school class period 5 day per week 10 month . One day per week devote didactic presentation and/or discussion reason active , way overcome barrier active , strategy maintain active lifestyle . The remain four day structure activity session , include range activity modify basketball , aerobic dance , walk around track . Primary outcome measure include bone mass ( measure via dual-energy x-ray absorptiometer [ DEXA ] ) serum urinary measure bone formation resorption . Participants contact telephone 12 month final clinic visit ascertain activity level time .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Entering 10th 11th grade Participating few three vigorous activity session per week last 20 minute fewer five moderate activity session per week last 30 minute At 75 percentile age genderspecific cardiovascular fitness Past age first menstrual cycle Exclusion Criteria Health problem would preclude participation regular exercise
